content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.Review (
    [business_id] nvarchar(4000),
    [cool] bigint,
    [date] date,
    [funny] bigint,
    [review_id] nvarchar(4000),
    [stars] FLOAT,
    [useful] bigint,
    [user_id] nvarchar(4000),
    [cleaned_review] varchar(MAX)
)  
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'yelp_academic_dataset_review.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = [gold-layer_saprojectdatalake_dfs_core_windows_net],
    FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
)
